mapper.select: SELECT B.BOARD_NO, B.EMP_NO, M.MEM_ID, S.STORE_NAME, B.BOARD_TITLE, B.BOARD_CONTENT, B.CREATE_DATE, B.BOARD_TYPE FROM BOARD B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.EMP_NO = M.EMP_NO JOIN STORE S ON M.STORE_ID = S.STORE_ID ORDER BY CASE WHEN M.MEM_ID = 'admin' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, B.BOARD_NO ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD (BOARD_NO, EMP_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, BOARD_TYPE) VALUES (BOARD_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{empNo}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, SYSDATE, 1)
